data.title: NTS Africa
data.text:
DellEMC

NTS Africa has partnered with DellEMC, an American multinational information technology corporation and one of the world's leading manufacturer of computers and other related products and services for Home, Small and Medium Businesses and Large Enterprise.

MICROSOFT

NTS Africa has partnered with Microsoft, an American multinational technology company headquartered in Redmond, Washington, that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports and sells computer software, consumer electronics and personal computers and services.

KEMP

NTS Africa has partnered with KEMP Technologies load balancer software, a company with over 30,000 enterprise customer deployments that need high availability, scalable and secure e-commerce, web and collaboration applications.

QUEST SOFTWARE

NTS Africa has partnered with Quest Software, a software company headquartered in Aliso Viejo, California. Founded in 1987, Quest develops and supports software used to simplify IT management.

SECURE WORKS

NTS Africa has partnered with Secure Works Inc. a United States-based subsidiary that provides information security services, protecting its customers' computers, networks and information assets from malicious activity such as cybercrime. The company has thousands of customers, ranging from Fortune 100 companies to mid-sized businesses in a variety of industries.

SONICWALL

NTS Africa has partnered with SonicWall, the leading innovator of cybersecurity technology and methodology. SonicWall has been fighting cybercrime for nearly 30 years. SonicWall, originally a private company headquartered in Milpitas, California, and Dell subsidiary from 2012 to 2016, sells a range of Internet appliances primarily directed at content control and network security. These include devices providing services for network firewalls, UTMs, VPNs, and anti-spam for email.

RedHat

NTS Africa has partnered with RedHat, Inc. is an American multinational software company that provides open source software products to enterprises. Founded in 1993, RedHat has its corporate headquarters in Raleigh, North Carolina, with other offices worldwide. RedHat deliver bespoke implementation services to its customers via our highly skilled RedHat specialists.

McAfee

NtS Africa has partnered with McAfee to deliver security solutions and services that helps secure data where it lives. Services includes Cloud Access broker, Web/Container/Mobile-secuirty, Intrusion Prevention, Endpoint security, detection, response and incident management. McAfee offers solutions that protects consumers and and businesses of all sizes for both cloud and on-premise data from the latest malware and emerging online threats.
